attributes.action: Review the whole process of Brexit if Theresa May loses General Election
attributes.additional_details: Theresa May has triggered our removal from the European Union before subsequently requesting a general election within a few months. If she is to lose the reflection it would reflect the country's view that she is not an adequate leader therefore, any policies which she has enforced including the triggering of article 50 must be reviewed and in some cases retracted as she would not deliver on the promises made, or be in a position to make such decisions.
attributes.background: Due to Theresa May requesting a General Election it is requested if she is to be voted out of power that the her signature of Article 50 be retracted and our removal from the E.U. halted.

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
